Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.9.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.9.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package packer is earlier than 1.9.5-1, affected by CVE-2023-48795
